name: Gehenna Trench
description:
"The Gehenna Trench, located just a few kilometers off the coast of Turkey, is a true marvel of nature. Multiple species not found anywhere on the planet else call this deep sea trench home..."

As a denizen at the bottom of the Gehenna Trench food chain you must traverse the dangerous sea while avoiding dangerous predators. Gehenna Trench features a carefully crafted horror atmosphere, detailed environments, creepy fish inspired by real life deep sea monstrosities, and gruesome death animations.

NOTE: Gehenna Trench does not feature a save system and is intended to be completed in a single session which should last 10-20 minutes.
